title: Miami coach discusses matchup against Northern Illinois
text:
Miami coach discusses matchup against Northern Illinois 
Updated: Mon, Oct 12 2015, 03:58 PM 
OXFORD, Ohio (WKRC) -- Miami football coach Chuck Martin discusses the loss at Ohio U and previews this Saturday's game against Northern Illinois in the video. The teams will meet at 2:30 p.m. in Oxford. Miami has dropped five straight games. Video courtesy Miami University Athletics Related Stories Entertainment News

AB InBev, SABMiller OK in principle to set up beer merger 
BRUSSELS (AP) -- Belgian-Brazilian AB InBev have announced an agreement in principle with SABMiller to take over the brewer at about $68 a share to create the world's biggest beer giant. Science/Tech News
